name: Oh Ship Arena
description:
This game is fast paced, heart racing, and progressive. Take command of your ship, step into the arena and test your skills. Dominate your opponents, collect star power to upgrade your ship, and try your best to beat your score and be ranked world wide. May luck be with you hero!

GamePlay:
This is a twin axis shooter. You are bound by an arena and have to defend off waves of enemy ships. Every enemy destroyed drops star power. Collect the star power to increase your score multiplier and also use the star power after the game to upgrade your ship.

Star Power:
Every star collected increases your score multiplier
Stars can be used like currency to upgrade your mother ship

Upgrades Include:
Ship Health
Ship Speed
Ship Fire Speed
Ship damage
Ship Critical Strike chance

Game includes Steam Leaderboard:
Try to beat your best score and compare your score to others around the world

Note from Developer:
This is currently a single player game. I have planned updates for the game coming soon. I hope to also some day make this a multiplayer game if I can get enough support from the community.
